name: manitoba
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a province (= a large area that is governed as part of a country) of central Canada, whose capital city is Winnipeg: Two-thirds of Manitoba's population live in urban areas.
More examplesFewer examplesA sea of grass and wildflowers once stretched from Northern Texas through Manitoba. Quebec has virtually no Internet pharmacy business, while it booms in the prairie towns of Manitoba.He is an expert in energy economics at the University of Manitoba in Winnipeg. It was somewhat milder than normal in most of Manitoba, Ontario, and western Quebec.
